summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Twenty-second Avenue from East Cherry Street to East Terrace Street et al, in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing and constructing concrete sidewalks under Ordinance No. 14967, creating Local Improvement District No. 1321 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
